-- use CETAS to export select statement with OPENROWSET result to  storage
use globalmart_db
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE customers_new
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'aggregated_data/cust_tbl',
    DATA_SOURCE = externalDataSource01,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)  
AS
SELECT DISTINCT(customer_id)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestore01.dfs.core.windows.net/synfiles01/syn_mod_1/customers.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) WITH (
        customer_id VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        state VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY state;



-- you can query the newly created external table
SELECT * FROM cust_by_state
